page.title: 04Local News in Shapwick
page.content: {FROM THE BRIDGWATER MERCURY {WOMENS INSTITUTE}The birthday girl for May was given a posy.Her trip was to the Huntspill Pottery in June.Some of the Womens Institute are thinking of going to a Midsummers Madness dance at Stawell.They will do the refreshments as a donation. {RUGBY TACKLE}- from Inspector Jones helped restore peace,when a riot broke out,after a Halloween party.He had got home to Shapwick when his wife told him,so he went out to play rugby! {TUPPERWARE PARTY}-was held in the hall to raise money for the{playgroup. {ROGATION SUNDAY-}Villages around Shapwick were asked to join in on the walk through Shapwick.Prayers were given and hymns sung,music from the {Burtle Silver Band.
